mapper.select: call rd_admin.sp_admin_service_center_qna_list(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_service_center_qna_detail(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_service_center_qna_operate(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* Cus_Question.xml - getFaqGroupList */ select slct_type from rd_data.tb_service_center_faq where view_on = 1 group by slct_type

select count(*) as qnaCnt, IFNULL(sum(if(slct_type = 1, 1, 0)),0) as type1Cnt, IFNULL(sum(if(slct_type = 2, 1, 0)),0) as type2Cnt, IFNULL(sum(if(slct_type = 3, 1, 0)),0) as type3Cnt, IFNULL(sum(if(slct_type = 4, 1, 0)),0) as type4Cnt, IFNULL(sum(if(slct_type = 5, 1, 0)),0) as type5Cnt, IFNULL(sum(if(slct_type = 6, 1, 0)),0) as type6Cnt, IFNULL(sum(if(slct_type = 7, 1, 0)),0) as type7Cnt, IFNULL(sum(if(slct_type = 99, 1, 0)),0) as type99Cnt from rd_data.tb_service_center_qna where idx > 0 and mem_no = #{mem_no}
